title: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg’s $14 billion AI hire Alexandr Wang’s journey: How family support shaped AI billionaire
description: Alexandr Wang, the $14-billion AI hire of Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg, has emerged as one of the youngest billionaires in the technology world. Behind his rapid rise lies strong family support, which played a crucial role in shaping his journey and success in the artificial intelligence space.
content: In 2025, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg took a major step by tapping 28-year-old Alexandr Wang, the founder of Scale AI, to head the company’s artificial intelligence efforts. As part of the arrangement, Meta committed roughly $14.3 billion to Scale AI, ma... [1950 chars]

title: Companies adopting AI to automate hiring, save time and scale screening: Report
description: As artificial intelligence continues to expand its footprint across sectors, companies are increasingly adopting AI-driven tools to streamline their hiring processes, particularly in candidate screening, according to a report by Apna.co, a networking and job search platform.

title: 18% earnings growth in 2026, says Julius Baer strategist
description: Mark Matthews of Bank Julius Baer & Co. does not believe Indian IT companies will be entirely displaced by artificial intelligence and expects them to adapt and find new opportunities within the technology cycle, with any easing in trade relations providing an added tailwind.
content:

title: Faraday Future announces Delivery of FX Super One to RAK Digital Assets Oasis and Completion of FF 91 2.0 Delivery Process to Hebron Sher; FF Middle East Company Signs Strategic Cooperation MOU with R
description: Faraday Future and RAK Digital Assets Oasis (also known as RAK Innovation City) have entered into a strategic non-binding MOU to collaborate across three key areas: AI, Web3 and embodied intelligence.The two parties intend to explore the joint establishment of research and innovation centers to build a forward-looking, demonstrative industrial ecosystem.FF delivered the FX Super One to RAK Innovation City, the second FX Super One delivery in the UAE. The first FX Super One user in the UAE is global football legend Andrés Iniesta.FF has completed the delivery and transaction process for the Company’s next FF 91 2.0 Futurist Alliance vehicle with Hebron Sher, Co-Founder & CEO of ZEVO, with an upcoming delivery ceremony in January 2026. RAS AL KHAIMAH, United Arab Emirates and LOS ANGELES, Dec. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Faraday Future Intelligent Electric Inc. (NASDAQ: FFAI) ('Faraday Future”, 'FF” or the 'Company”), a California-based global shared intelligent electric mobility ecosystem company, today announced that Faraday Future Middle East FZ-LLC has signed a memorandum of understanding (MOU) with RAK Digital Assets Oasis (also known as RAK Innovation City). Under the MOU, the two parties intend to cooperate across three major areas of exploration: artificial intelligence (AI), Web3 and the digital economy, and embodied intelligence.
content:
Faraday Future and RAK Digital Assets Oasis (also known as RAK Innovation City) have entered into a strategic non-binding MOU to collaborate across three key areas: AI, Web3 and embodied intelligence.

title: Fast growth, fading confidence: Trump's US looks resilient but not at ease in latest economic data
description: The US economy beat expectations to grow at 4.3% in the July-September quarter, but the real state of the economy is complicated as consumer confidence has continued to fall, unemployment has surged, and growth appears to be fuelled by wealthier households and artificial intelligence (AI) boom alone.

title: AI data centres are forcing dirty ‘peaker’ power plants back into service
description: The rarely-used eight-unit Fisk power plant owned by Houston-based NRG Energy was scheduled to retire next year. ‍But then came from artificial intelligence.
content:
In Chicago’s working-class Pilsen neighborhood, a 60s-era oil-fired power plant rises up from an industrial lot behind Dvorak Park, which in warmer weather is packed with children climbing on its colorful playground and zooming down slides.

title: HashMicro Showcases the Power of AI-Driven ERP at Singapore's Leading Tech Forum
description: SINGAPORE, Dec. 24, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- HashMicro attended the SME AI Growth Day 2025 on December 4th in Singapore. Organized by Alibaba Cloud, the event brought together more than 250 business leaders, technology players, and industry decision-makers to explore how artificial intelligence (AI) can be applied effectively to drive business growth.

title: Can AI surpass humans? Google DeepMind CEO claims AI can match human learning, Elon Musk backs the view
description: Google DeepMind CEO has suggested that artificial intelligence is capable of learning anything humans can, a view that has drawn support from Elon Musk, adding fresh momentum to the debate over how far AI can ultimately rival human intelligence.
content:
Artificial intelligence is once again in the spotlight. A new debate has started over whether AI can one day learn and think like humans. Some top technology leaders believe this could happen in the future, while others are not so sure.

title: AGI debate heats up as Demis Hassabis calls Yann LeCun’s view ‘plain incorrect’
description: The exchange between LeCun and Hassabis underscores broader differences in how the pair view the path to achieving artificial general intelligence (AGI).
content:
